title: Mutual Distillation Extracting Spatial-temporal Knowledge for Lightweight Multi-channel Sleep Stage Classification
details: Z Jia, H Wang, Y Liu, T Jiang - Proceedings of the 30th ACM SIGKDD Conference on …, 2024
abstract: Sleep stage classification has important clinical significance for the diagnosis of sleep-related diseases. To pursue more accurate sleep stage classification, multi- channel sleep signals are widely used due to the rich spatial-temporal information …

title: DistillSleepNet: Heterogeneous Multi-Level Knowledge Distillation via Teacher Assistant for Sleep Staging
details: Z Jia, H Liang, Y Liu, H Wang, T Jiang - IEEE Transactions on Big Data, 2024
abstract: Accurate sleep staging is crucial for the diagnosis of diseases such as sleep disorders. Existing sleep staging models with excellent performance are usually large and require a lot of computational resources, limiting their application on …
